org.deeplearning4j.nn.api

Interface Layer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLayer, ConvolutionDownSampleLayer, Layer, OutputLayer, SubsamplingLayer

    public interface Layer
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Interface for a layer of a neural network. This has an activation function, an input and output size, weights, and a bias

    • Method Summary

      Return a transposed copy of the weights/bias (this means reverse the number of inputs and outputs on the weights)
